mapper.select: select * from shoppingbag a,shoppingbagdetailinfo b where a.bag_id = b.bag_id and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update shoppingbag
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scommodity_id = #{scommodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commodity_qantity = #{commodityQantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scommodity_price = #{scommodityPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_detail = #{purchaseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
blacklist = #{blacklist,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where bag_id = #{bagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shoppingbag set store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scommodity_id = #{scommodityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_qantity = #{commodityQantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scommodity_price = #{scommodityPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase_detail = #{purchaseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, blacklist = #{blacklist,jdbcType=INTEGER} where bag_id = #{bagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
